title: Rune page Bug
body: My last two run pages (5&6) are bugged out and I believe linked together. I have seen multiple posts already about this and I am having the same problem where I can not Change/Save any changes for the 6th page and if I ever click one of the two to use in game, it automatically goes to my first rune page. Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body:
Those dang rune pages. I pulled up your account and it does look like those last two pages were, for some reason, always tied together. They should be good now, so give it a go and let me know!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Can you tell me how to fix this? Mine are doing the same thing!!!{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Since we've started seeing so many of these rune page issues, we'd like to try and get together a list of just how many Summoner's are being affected. Go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). This way we can track the issue and get your runes fixed at the same time!
Mine are all good now, thanks so much for the quick help! I appreciate it a lot. <3
mine does the same how can i fix this?
